response.msg:
嗯，用户要求我整理关于"关注第八届进博会"的信息。让我看看搜索结果有什么内容……

哇，第八届进博会就在11月5日开幕，也就是后天！国家会展中心已经准备好了，"四叶草"的装饰工作都完成了。这届规模好大啊，展览面积超过43万平方米，有155个国家、地区和国际组织参与，4108家境外企业参展。还有461项新产品、新技术、新服务要展示，中国这个大市场真的成了全球创新的试验场。

进博会今年好多创新点呢。首次设立了最不发达国家产品专区，让53个非洲建交国的产品零关税进入中国。还成立了小语种志愿者联盟，有3865名志愿者宣誓上岗了，包括71名港澳台志愿者和30名外籍留学生。志愿者们可以通过"随申行"APP获取实时交通指引。

交通方面上海做了很多准备工作。新增了约2000个停车位，总停车位达到5000个。还上线了"进博会停车预约系统"，可以通过"上海停车"APP和小程序预约。建议大家尽量选择公共交通出行，因为停车资源有限。

好多大企业都要参展。大众汽车连续八年全勤参展，要带旗下四大品牌、八款车型来展示。特斯拉的Cybercab无人驾驶出租车将在进博会上进行亚太首秀。花王也设置了"技术与品质"展区，展示他们138年的匠心品质。

进博会期间还有丰富的配套活动。虹桥论坛将举办33场分论坛及闭门会，新增了"全球南方农业可持续发展论坛"。交旅融合服务也很棒，持证人员可以免费坐11条双层观光巴士线路，还能享受浦江游览专享优惠。

进博会已经不仅是一个展会了，它正在推动"展品变商品、展商变投资商"的转变。青浦区还组建了355人的"招商百人团"，精准对接280家重点参展企业。

最后提醒大家可以通过"随申行"APP获取交通指引、文旅优惠和展馆导航服务。准备好去参加这场开放合作的国际盛会吧！


以下是第八届中国国际进口博览会（进博会）的核心信息整合，综合时效性、权威性与实用性：
### **一、展会概况与规模**
1. **时间与地点**
- 举办日期：**2025年11月5日-10日**（共6天）
- 地点：国家会展中心（上海）"四叶草"，外观装饰已完工，静候开幕。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [1, 20], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228421137039460", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "黄惟冰", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228688042103700", "index": 20, "label": ""}], "name": "新华网", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.8.11.119.119.50/0034c2ttly8h8vg8d8h2ij6046046q2t02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=%2BVlplCbfWI", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228421137039460", "vType": 3}}```

2. **参展规模创历史新高**
- **155个国家/地区和国际组织**参与，**4108家境外企业**参展。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [3, 9, 43], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "东方财经", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228591458553169", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "看看新闻Knews", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228138181165468", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视三农", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226671461893822", "index": 43, "label": ""}], "name": "东方财经", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006ckfnZly8hiy2p0p8fqj30u00u040d.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=z5sxkmTNdl", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228591458553169", "vType": 3}}```
- 展览总面积超**43万平方米**，较往届进一步扩容。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [9, 46], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "看看新闻Knews", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228138181165468", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "汇川融媒", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227833662375555", "index": 46, "label": ""}], "name": "看看新闻Knews", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.410.410.50/6e05a6daly1h8vg7kmg7ej20be0bemxf.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=Ju5jb%2B%2Fej7", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228138181165468", "vType": 3}}```
- **461项**新产品、新技术、新服务集中亮相，涵盖高端装备、医疗器械、绿色低碳等领域。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [9, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "看看新闻Knews", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228138181165468", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "微醺颂聆", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228678596266475", "index": 32, "label": ""}]}}```

3. **主题与亮点**
- 核心主题：**"扩大开放确定性应对全球不确定性"** 。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [17, 38], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "菟汱", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228664260395711", "index": 17, "label": ""}, {"name": "禹粥真真", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228660650934386", "index": 38, "label": ""}]}}```
- **非洲零关税专区**：首次设立最不发达国家产品专区，推动53个非洲建交国产品零关税入华。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [38], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "禹粥真真", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228660650934386", "index": 38, "label": ""}]}}```
- **小语种志愿者联盟**：3865名志愿者（含71名港澳台志愿者、30名外籍留学生）已宣誓上岗。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [11, 45], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "看看新闻Knews", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227203277357680", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "上海校园", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227417028267603", "index": 45, "label": ""}]}}```
新华网
央视三农
东方财经
看看新闻Knews

### **二、重要活动与创新举措**
1. **虹桥国际经济论坛**
- 设置**33场分论坛及闭门会**，新增"全球南方农业可持续发展论坛"。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [43], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视三农", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226671461893822", "index": 43, "label": "大v"}], "name": "央视三农", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/007XX2J2ly8hw91nmkhqqj30go0go75j.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=TCM0YhQPzX", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226671461893822", "vType": 3}}```
- 吸引**8位诺贝尔奖得主**、400余位政商学界人士共议全球治理议题。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [9], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "看看新闻Knews", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228138181165468", "index": 9, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **首发经济与科技亮点**
- **特斯拉Cybercab无人驾驶出租车**亚太首秀（2026年投产，成本低于3万美元）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [41], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "IT之家", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227467669505104", "index": 41, "label": "大v"}], "name": "IT之家", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/001ZzMwgly8gurhm3cm5jj60go0godfv02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=yXJv7mMokN", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227467669505104", "vType": 3}}```
- **大众汽车**携8款车型亮相，展示本土研发成果。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [37], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财经杂志", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228606693578269", "index": 37, "label": "大v"}], "name": "财经杂志", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.12.0.1049.1049.50/001PXWsJly8h8v8abgp2lj60u00u2t9l02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=pT0MCQb0nv", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228606693578269", "vType": 3}}```
- **以色列展团**聚焦农业科技，首发菌根真菌接种剂等低碳技术。

3. **城市服务保障升级**
- **交通优化**：
- 新增**约2000个停车位**，总量达5000个，开通11条免费接驳线。
- 上线"**进博会停车预约系统**"（通过"上海停车"APP预约），推荐使用"**随申行**"APP获取实时交通指引。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [10, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228109131415594", "index": 10, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "凌冬顺嬷-忱然热恋ing", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228685265474186", "index": 21, "label": ""}], "name": "上海发布", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.50/002LTpVoly1h8vidpaln1j60hs0hst9f02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=dR2HXeO3gC", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228109131415594", "vType": 1}}```
- **证件便利化**：复用历史证件（第五至七届），外籍展客商可全程网办电子签证。
财经杂志

### **三、参展商与溢出效应**
1. **全球企业参与**
- **170家企业及27家机构**连续8年参展（"八年全勤生"）。
- **美企参展面积连续7年第一**，如乔山健康科技展位扩至600㎡，首发AI家庭健身生态。

2. **产业链深化与招商成果**
- 青浦区组建**355人招商团**，精准对接280家参展企业，推动"展商变投资商"。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [44], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "北京昌平", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227809603061899", "index": 44, "label": "大v"}], "name": "北京昌平", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/961b0597ly8i0irixyktcj20go0go3zb.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=%2BJGNo7orvi", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227809603061899", "vType": 1}}```
- 联合国儿童基金会、花王等国际机构设立专题展台与边会，聚焦供应链合作与儿童权益。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 36, "data": {"num": [36, 39], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "联合国儿童基金会", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227460610491034", "index": 39, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "日本花王", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227854901281662", "index": 36, "label": ""}], "name": "联合国儿童基金会", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.17.7.670.670.50/6843b943ly8gk7k1zqi1hj20j60j6aau.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=t4WzZOPQ0C", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227460610491034", "vType": 1}}```

3. **文旅融合服务**
- 持证人员可免费乘坐**11条双层观光巴士**线路，串联朱家角古镇等景点。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 38, "data": {"num": [10], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228109131415594", "index": 10, "label": ""}]}}```
- 浦江游览、中国航海博物馆推出进博专属优惠。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 39, "data": {"num": [10, 40], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228109131415594", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "萝bro喜欢color", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228663962604019", "index": 40, "label": ""}]}}```
联合国儿童基金会
日本花王
北京昌平

### **四、参观提示与建议**
1. **出行指南**
- 优先选择**轨道交通17号线**（避开2号线拥挤），从北登录厅入场。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 43, "data": {"num": [12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "东方卫视番茄台", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227079646839820", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}], "name": "东方卫视番茄台", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.500.500.50/001VDYkMly8hx9ufk04czj60dw0dwmxd02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=y%2B0yip2A34", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227079646839820", "vType": 3}}```
- 出租车即停即走下客点：P0、P1、P6、P8、P15停车场（开放时间各异）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 44, "data": {"num": [12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "东方卫视番茄台", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227079646839820", "index": 12, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **数字工具推荐**
- **"随申行"APP**：提供"进博交通出行服务专区"，整合路线规划、停车预约、文旅优惠及"零碳会议"碳积分兑换功能。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 46, "data": {"num": [10, 28, 40], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228109131415594", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "-Scintillante", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228681251258544", "index": 28, "label": ""}, {"name": "萝bro喜欢color", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228663962604019", "index": 40, "label": ""}]}}```

3. **参展须知**
- **特殊食品临时许可**：未获注册的婴幼儿配方乳粉等产品需在11月4日前申请临时许可。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 48, "data": {"num": [7], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海市场监管", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5222312653882128", "index": 7, "label": ""}], "name": "上海市场监管", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.50/93f54799ly1h8vkvnc3nmj20hs0hsjth.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762112010&ssig=x4peEcvMTI", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5222312653882128", "vType": 1}}```
- **禁限措施**：展区内禁止特殊食品试吃、现场交易及提货（需通过跨境电商下单）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 49, "data": {"num": [7], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "上海市场监管", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5222312653882128", "index": 7, "label": ""}]}}```
上海市场监管
东方卫视番茄台

### **五、意义与展望**
本届进博会通过**制度创新**（如零关税专区）、**科技赋能**（数字服务）与**体验升级**（文旅融合），强化中国作为"全球创新试验场"的角色，为全球经贸复苏注入新动能。其溢出效应正从展品交易延伸至产业链协作与城市治理升级，彰显中国高水平开放的决心。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 51, "data": {"num": [26, 32, 38, 40], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "槐lin", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228681324660431", "index": 26, "label": ""}, {"name": "微醺颂聆", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228678596266475", "index": 32, "label": ""}, {"name": "禹粥真真", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228660650934386", "index": 38, "label": ""}, {"name": "萝bro喜欢color", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228663962604019", "index": 40, "label": ""}]}}```
